meta.ip: This the third letter we have that was written by Yohan, one of the twelve interns who spent the most time with Yeshua.

This letter was sent to one of Yohan's friends named Gaius. Yohan praises Gaius for the way he'd looked after other believers and for his living out God's truth. Yohan also warns Gaius about a person named Diotrephes who was opposing the believers.

rem: This is still a very early look into the unfinished text of the
of the Bible. Please double-check the text in advance before using in public.

contents: This letter is from Yohan the elder¦155485 to my dear friend Gaius¦155486 who I love
follow the truth¦155493.
contents.verseText: This letter is from Yohan the elder¦155485 to my dear friend Gaius¦155486 who I love because we both follow the truth¦155493.

contents: My dear friend, I trust that you are healthy¦155501 and doing well in everything just as you are also doing well spiritually.
contents.verseText: My dear friend, I trust that you are healthy¦155501 and doing well in everything just as you are also doing well spiritually.

contents: I was very happy when some of our
brothers¦155511 came and told us about your¦155515 faithfulness to the truth and how you are living it out.
contents.verseText: I was very happy when some of our spiritual brothers¦155511 came and told us about your¦155515 faithfulness to the truth and how you are living it out.

contents: Nothing makes me more happy than hearing¦155532 that other believers that I've helped are living out the truth¦155538.
contents.verseText: Nothing makes me more happy than hearing¦155532 that other believers that I've helped are living out the truth¦155538.

contents: My dear friend, you are faithful¦155541 in what you do for other believers¦155548. Even strangers¦155553
contents.verseText: My dear friend, you are faithful¦155541 in what you do for other believers¦155548. Even strangers¦155553

contents: have told the assembly¦155560 about your¦155556 caring for them before¦155559 sending them on. Your¦155556 actions will be praised by

contents: because¦155572 they¦155577 went¦155577 out to serve God, not getting any help from the unbelievers.
contents.verseText: because¦155572 they¦155577 went¦155577 out to serve God, not getting any help from the unbelievers.

contents: We should be supporting¦155587 believers like them so that we may also become¦155593 their workmates in sharing the truth¦155597.
contents.verseText: We should be supporting¦155587 believers like them so that we may also become¦155593 their workmates in sharing the truth¦155597.

contents: I wrote¦155598 something¦155600 to the assembly¦155602, but Diotrephes¦155607 won't listen to us—he always wants the limelight for himself.
contents.verseText: I wrote¦155598 something¦155600 to the assembly¦155602, but Diotrephes¦155607 won't listen to us—he always wants the limelight for himself.

contents: Because¦155611 of that, if I do end up coming, I will be reminding¦155616 him about what he's been doing¦155621—rambling¦155624 on against¦155624 us with evil¦155623 talks, and then, not being¦155629 happy with that, he doesn't accept other believers¦155636 and expels them from the assembly¦155645 then forbids¦155641 others from accepting¦155634 them either.
contents.verseText: Because¦155611 of that, if I do end up coming, I will be reminding¦155616 him about what he's been doing¦155621—rambling¦155624 on against¦155624 us with evil¦155623 talks, and then, not being¦155629 happy with that, he doesn't accept other believers¦155636 and expels them from the assembly¦155645 then forbids¦155641 others from accepting¦155634 them either.

contents: My dear friend, don't¦155648 copy the evil things
, just the good things. Anyone who does what is good belongs to God—anyone who does evil things has not seen¦155665 God.
contents.verseText: My dear friend, don't¦155648 copy the evil things that others do, just the good things. Anyone who does what is good belongs to God—anyone who does evil things has not seen¦155665 God.

contents: Demetrius¦155668 has been talked about by everyone and even the truth¦155679 itself¦155674 speaks. We have also spoken about him, and you¦155686 know that what we¦155681 say is true.
contents.verseText: Demetrius¦155668 has been talked about by everyone and even the truth¦155679 itself¦155674 speaks. We have also spoken about him, and you¦155686 know that what we¦155681 say is true.

contents: I had many things I wanted to write¦155699 about, but¦155701 won't do it by means of ink¦155706 and¦155707 pen¦155708,
contents.verseText: I had many things I wanted to write¦155699 about, but¦155701 won't do it by means of ink¦155706 and¦155707 pen¦155708,

contents: but¦155714 instead I hope to see¦155718 you¦155717 soon and¦155719 then we¦155724 can speak¦155724 face to face.

contents: Wishing all peace and happiness for you.
friends here also greet you. Please greet
friends there by name.
contents.verseText: Wishing all peace and happiness for you. Your friends here also greet you. Please greet our friends there by name.
